modules.title: Facial Action Coding System Explore the Hidden Language of Emotion
modules.subtitle: Understand how 44 Action Units reveal the microstructure of human expression.
modules.main_paragraph_bold: Learn the anatomy of emotion through Paul Ekman’s Facial Action Coding System and discover how the face becomes a living map of feeling.
modules.paragraph_1: The FACS module introduces you to the scientific study of facial movement. Each Action Unit represents a specific muscular change that contributes to expressions recognised across all cultures. This framework, developed through decades of research, bridges psychology, anatomy, and emotional intelligence.
modules.paragraph_2: By exploring individual AUs, you learn to see emotion as both biology and art. The ability to interpret these subtle movements enhances empathy, perception, and understanding of human connection. EmotionDeck transforms scientific knowledge into an accessible and engaging learning experience.

modules.title: Zener Quiz Test Your Intuition and Perception
modules.subtitle: Discover the classic Zener Card experiment reinvented through EmotionDeck.
modules.main_paragraph_bold: Challenge Your Intuition with the EmotionDeck Zener Quiz.
modules.paragraph_1: Step into the timeless world of intuition testing with the EmotionDeck Zener Quiz, inspired by the historic experiment created by psychologist Karl Zener and parapsychologist J. B. Rhine. This digital reimagining combines scientific curiosity with aesthetic precision, inviting you to explore the mysterious boundary between perception and chance. Through 25 interactive rounds, you will experience how intuition unfolds under focus, attention, and emotional resonance.
modules.paragraph_2: Each round presents five universal symbols Circle, Plus, Waves, Square, and Star designed to test the subtle dynamics of perception beyond logic. Your task is simple yet profound predict the hidden symbol, trust your first instinct, and see whether your awareness can rise above statistical probability. The results visualise your intuitive rhythm and reveal how focus, emotion, and mental clarity interact in real time. What begins as a simple guessing game evolves into a reflection on consciousness, pattern recognition, and the fine balance between knowledge and intuition.
